title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document all functional and non-functional requirements for the BlockchainVotingSystem, including security, scalability, user experience considerations, and compliance with relevant laws and regulations.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the blockchain network, voting client applications, and backend services.

title: Implement Blockchain Network
description: Develop and deploy the blockchain network that will securely store and verify voting data.

title: Develop Voting Client Applications
description: Build the client applications (web, mobile, or desktop) that voters will use to securely cast their votes.

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Develop the backend services responsible for managing voter registration, election setup, and result tallying.

title: Design and Implement Security Measures
description: Develop and implement robust security measures to ensure the integrity and confidentiality of the voting process.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the BlockchainVotingSystem components.

title: Conduct System Testing
description: Perform comprehensive testing of the BlockchainVotingSystem, including functional, security, performance, and usability testing.
dependencies: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment

title: Document System Architecture and Usage
description: Create detailed documentation for the system architecture, deployment, and usage instructions for administrators and voters.

title: Deploy and Monitor Production System
description: Deploy the BlockchainVotingSystem to a production environment and implement monitoring and alerting mechanisms.
